unknown_index.description: The provided data index does not exist

unknown_collection.description: The provided data collection does not exist

get_limit_exceeded.description: The number of documents returned by this request exceeds the configured server limit
get_limit_exceeded.message: The number of documents returned by this request exceeds the configured server limit ( %s ).

write_limit_exceeded.description: The number of documents edited by this request exceeds the configured server limit
write_limit_exceeded.message: The number of documents edited by this request exceeds the configured server limit ( %s ).

import_failed.description: Failed to import some or all documents
import_failed.message: Failed to import some or all documents: %s.

no_multi_indexes.description: Cannot be run on multiple indexes
no_multi_indexes.message: Cannot be run on multiple indexes.

no_multi_collections.description: Cannot be run on multiple collections
no_multi_collections.message: Cannot be run on multiple collections.

incomplete_fetch.description: Couldn't retrieve all the requested documents
incomplete_fetch.message: Couldn't retrieve all the requested documents.

incomplete_delete.description: Couldn't delete all the requested documents
incomplete_delete.message: Couldn't delete all the requested documents: %s

incomplete_create.description: Couldn't create all the requested documents
incomplete_create.message: Couldn't create all the requested documents: %s

bootstrap_timeout.description: Bootstrap of a storage instance failed because it has been locked for too much time
bootstrap_timeout.message: %s: bootstrap failed - lock wait timeout exceeded.

version_mismatch.description: The version of the target Elasticsearch is not compatible with this version of Kuzzle
version_mismatch.message: Your elasticsearch version is %s; Only elasticsearch version 5 is currently supported.

unknown_scroll_id.description: The scroll identifier does not exist or has expired

search_as_an_id.description: Used "_search" as a document identifier, which conflicts with the _search HTTP route
search_as_an_id.message: _search is not a valid document identifier

unknown_index_collection.description: The provided index and/or collection doesn't exist
unknown_index_collection.message: The provided index and/or collection doesn't exist.

document_already_exists.description: A document with the same identifier already exists

missing_argument.description: A required argument is missing or is empty
missing_argument.message: Required argument "%s" is missing or is empty

index_protected.description: The content of a protected index cannot be modified with generic API routes
index_protected.message: Index '%s' is protected, use the appropriated routes instead.

index_reserved.description: Index names starting with a "%" are reserved and cannot be used
index_reserved.message: Indexes starting with a '%' are reserved for internal use. Cannot process index %s.

not_connected.description: Unable to connect to the storage instance

too_many_operations.message: "%s" threads buffer exceeded. Too many operations received at once.

cannot_change_mapping.description: Cannot change the mapping of a field (once set, a field mapping cannot be changed)
cannot_change_mapping.message: Field "%s" already has a mapping, and it cannot be changed

duplicate_field_mapping.description: A same field cannot have different mappings within the same index (fields are shared to all of an index collections)
duplicate_field_mapping.message: Cannot set mapping for field "%s" on collection "%s" because this field name is already used in another collection, with a different type.

unexpected_properties.message: Property "%s" is not supported for field "%s".

invalid_mapping_type.message: Field "%s": the data type "%s" doesn't exist

field_parse_failed.description: The mapping field cannot be parsed
field_parse_failed.message: Failed to validate value of field "%s". Are you trying to insert a nested value in a non-nested field?

too_many_changes.description: Too many changes occured on the same resource in a small amount of time. Try with the "retryOnConflict" option
too_many_changes.message: Unable to modify document "%s": cluster sync failed (too many simultaneous changes applied)

unexpected_bad_request.description: Embeds an unexpected bad request error from Elasticsearch

unexpected_not_found.description: Embeds an unexpected notfound error from Elasticsearch

unexpected_error.description: Embeds an unexpected error from Elasticsearch

no_mapping_found.description: Attempted to read a non-existent mapping

read_failed.description: An attempt to read from the cache failed

not_connected.description: Unable to connect to the cache server
not_connected.message: Unable to connect to the cache server.
